template.name: editorconfig
template.value:
root = true
[*] charset=utf-8 end_of_line=lf insert_final_newline=true trim_trailing_whitespace=true indent_size=4 indent_style=space
[*.md] trim_trailing_whitespace=false
[{.travis.yml,package.json}] # The indent size used in the `package.json` file cannot be changed # https://github.com/npm/npm/pull/3180#issuecomment-16336516 indent_size = 2 indent_style = space
